oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EXPERIMENTS ON NONLINEAR WAVE GROUPS SHOALING IN A TANK
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shemer, L.
Jiao, Haiying
Kit, E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: nonlinear waves
wave group
shoaling
wave experiments
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Evolution of periodically generated wave groups of different shapes that propagate over a sloping beach is studied experimentally and theoretically, by solving numerically the cubic Schrodinger equation. The agreements and disagreements between the experimental and the numerical results are discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
